modName: REVENGE armor by Ilias- Blades Retexture for male and female
summary: Revenge Armor by Ilias for male and female
descriptionHtml:
This is the Revenge armor
it´s a HD retexture of the Blade´s armor 
for man and woman characters

I´d like to share with you this retexture

It was a hard work and take´s me lot of time but it was olso a lot of fun

please endorse if you like it

you can use this mod 
for free to modify or whatever

enjoy


Installation

Use ´modmanager
or whatever :-)

credits

bethesda
NEXUS
